mapper.select: select id, enterprise_account_id, talent_order_id, transferor_info, transfer_way, transfer_date, creator_id, gmt_create, regenerator_id, gmt_modified from construction_industry_api.t_talent_entry where id = #{talent_entry_id}
select id , orderno , enterprise_id , enterprise_name from construction_industry_api.t_talent_order where id = #{talent_order_id}

select id, talent_entry_id, status, talent_id, full_name, entry_amount, funds_purpose, other_fee, contract_balance, enterprise_offer, enterprise_offer_number, enterprise_offer_unit, talent_price, talent_price_number, number_unit, creator_id, gmt_create, regenerator_id, gmt_modified, talent_order_id, approval_opinion from construction_industry_api.t_talent_entry_record order by id desc limit #{page.currentPage},#{page.pageSize}

select t1.id , t1.talent_entry_id , t1.status , t1.talent_id , t1.full_name , t1.entry_amount , t1.funds_purpose , t1.other_fee , t1.contract_balance , t1.enterprise_offer , t1.enterprise_offer_number , t1.enterprise_offer_unit , t1.talent_price , t1.talent_price_number , t1.number_unit , t1.creator_id , t1.gmt_create , t1.regenerator_id , t1.gmt_modified , t1.talent_order_id , t1.approval_opinion , t2.id as id2 , t2.enterprise_account_id , t2.talent_order_id , t2.transferor_info , t2.transfer_way , t2.transfer_date , t2.creator_id as creator_id2 , t2.gmt_create as gmt_create2 , t2.regenerator_id as regenerator_id2 , t2.gmt_modified as gmt_modified2 from construction_industry_api.t_talent_entry_record as t1 left join construction_industry_api.t_talent_entry as t2 on t1.talent_entry_id = t2.id where t1.talent_id = #{talent_id}

select t1.id, t1.talent_entry_id, t1.status, t1.talent_id, t1.full_name, t1.entry_amount, t1.funds_purpose, t1.other_fee, t1.contract_balance, t1.enterprise_offer, t1.enterprise_offer_number, t1.enterprise_offer_unit, t1.talent_price, t1.talent_price_number, t1.number_unit, t1.creator_id, t1.gmt_create, t1.regenerator_id, t1.gmt_modified, t1.talent_order_id, t1.approval_opinion, t2.id as id2, t2.enterprise_account_id, t2.talent_order_id, t2.transferor_info, t2.transfer_way, t2.transfer_date, t2.creator_id as creator_id2, t2.gmt_create as gmt_create2, t2.regenerator_id as regenerator_id2, t2.gmt_modified as gmt_modified2 from construction_industry_api.t_talent_entry_record as t1 left join construction_industry_api.t_talent_entry as t2 on t2.id = t1.talent_entry_id where t1.id = #{id}
